title: smb backend does not work
body:
### expected behaviour
when login into the owncloud server, the user should be able to read/write files as normal.

### actual behaviour
when login in, the user gets a "you don't have write permissions" message

### steps to reproduce
1. clean install of owncloud using gentoo portage version
2. mounting smb locally with mount.cifs //xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx/owncloud /mnt/samba/owncloud -o users,username=xxxx,password=xxxx,uid=apache,gid=apache,nounix,dir_mode=0770,file_mode=0770

3. on the initial configuration setting as "local storage folder" /mnt/samba/owncloud

### server configuration
operating system: gentoo

web server: apache 2.2.25

database: mysql 5.1

php version: 5.5

owncloud version: 5.0.9

storage backend: samba shared mounted on local folder


### logs

no error shown in any log.
